sentences.en: Automobile headlight with halogen lamp has limitations on work - time and efficiency.
sentences.cn: 传统光源卤素灯泡用于前照灯照明,在节能和寿命上存在不足.

sentences.en: Could you put in a new headlight?
sentences.cn: 你能不能装一只新的头灯?

sentences.en: Even during idle stop and restart, headlight brightness , wiper speed , etc. remain constant.
sentences.cn: 甚至在怠速、再启动 、 亮前灯 、 使用刮水器等时仍是恒定值.

sentences.en: He asked her to shine the headlight on the door.
sentences.cn: 他叫她把前灯照到门上.

sentences.en: He rubbed at the windshield and strained his vision over the sweep of headlight.
sentences.cn: 他擦了擦挡风玻璃,紧盯着头灯扫过的区域.

sentences.en: Headlight dangling due to plastic snapping . Because part was not replaced properly.
sentences.cn: 由于更换部件时搞坏了塑料卡头,大灯有点摇晃.

sentences.en: I get off look, his car headlight crashed my car tail lamp, cullet sprayed one land.
sentences.cn: 我下车一看, 他的车前灯撞碎了我的车后灯, 碎玻璃洒了一地.

sentences.en: On your car you got a busted headlight.
sentences.cn: 你的车子上有只破碎了的前灯.

sentences.en: Suddenly, a figure appeared in my headlights.
sentences.cn: 突然，有个人影出现在我的车头灯前。

sentences.en: Tell me what is headlight switch?
The car needs a new headlight.
The headlight of the car lit up the road far ahead.
sentences.cn: 汽车的前灯照射着前方远处的路面.

sentences.en: The headlight was broken off the car.
sentences.cn: 车头灯已经从车上脱掉了.

sentences.en: This headlight is of unique quality.
sentences.cn: 这种车头灯具有无与伦比的性能.

sentences.en: Vehicle headlight affects not only automobile's appearance, but also driving safety "
sentences.cn: 汽车车灯的设计不仅影响汽车的外观, 还影响汽车的安全性.

trans.tran_en: one of the large lights at the front of a vehicle, or the beam of light produced by this
